Mod.Description: Add more rooms and life to your home.

Mod.Name: NickNo's Gangs of LifePlay: Kingpin

Mod.Name: Rizean Realism
Mod.Description: Realism - Overrides many actions to add a degree of realism i.e., perversion 0 can't whore them self's out. This should be the first mod you load to give other mods the chance to override it.

Mod.Name: Rizean CNC/BDSM
Mod.Description: CNC/BDSM - Adds new scenes and overrides/expands some core scenes with more options.

Mod.Name: SexyBastardo's Beauty Expansion (Plastic Surgery)
Mod.Description: Adds different beauty treatments to salons and plastic surgery with some story events.

Mod.Name: SexyBastardo's Better Pregnancy (Pregnancy Improvement)
Mod.Description: This is a HUGE addition to base pregnancy (around 1200% more content, not a joke :D).

Mod.Name: SexyBastardo's Pimp Your Girl (Sexwork Improvement)
Mod.Description: Adding a lot of possibilities to pimp out your girls.

Mod.Name: SexyBastardo's The New Goodbye (Date Improvements)
Mod.Description: Complete rework of the 'Say goodbye to your companion' scenes

Mod.Name: SexyBastardo's Party And Nightlife (House Party and Events)
Mod.Description: Improves the house party and adds new nightlife stuff.

Mod.Name: SexyBastardo's Body Weight and Fitness
Mod.Description: Adds weight gain and loss for player and NPCs

Mod.Name: r8kie's Additional Scenes
Mod.Description: Add additional scenes during all type of activities.

Mod.Name: VinnyB's Better Breakups
Mod.Description: Adds and modifies some events so that NPC breakups happen with or without you.
